title: Core focus on GST & Input Tax Credit: NRAI new president Sagar Daryani
description: The National Restaurant Association of India has elected Sagar Daryani as its new president. The association aims to address core issues like GST and Input Tax Credit. The food services sector is projected to grow significantly, employing about one crore people by 2028. Key recommendations include GST slab options and equitable e-commerce policies.
